org.jdesktop.core.animation.rendering
Interface JRendererTarget<D,G>

Type Parameters:
D - screen information for set up. GraphicsConfiguration is used for Swing. Display is used for SWT.
G - a graphics context usable for painting on the screen. Graphics2D is used for Swing. GC is used for SWT.
public interface JRendererTarget<D,G>

Allows implementors to control the contents of a component being drawn with either active or passive rendering.

All of these methods are invoked within the context of the rendering thread of the JRenderer this implementation is controlling.

Author:
Tim Halloran
See Also:
JRenderer

Method Summary
 void render(G g, int width, int height)
          Invoked once per rendering cycle to allow the implementation to paint onto a graphics object that is either the screen or an off-screen image that will subsequently painted onto the screen.
 void renderSetup(D d)
          Invoked once when the component being rendered is made visible to allow the implementation to perform any necessary setup.
 void renderShutdown()
          Invoked when rendering is shutdown to allow the implementation to perform any necessary cleanup.
 void renderUpdate()
          Invoked once per rendering cycle to allow the implementation to update its state.
 

Method Detail

renderSetup

void renderSetup(D d)
Invoked once when the component being rendered is made visible to allow the implementation to perform any necessary setup.

The passed screen information allows the the creation of compatible images.

Parameters:
d - describes the characteristics of the screen.

renderUpdate

void renderUpdate()
Invoked once per rendering cycle to allow the implementation to update its state.

Invoked prior to render(Object, int, int).

render

void render(G g,
            int width,
            int height)
Invoked once per rendering cycle to allow the implementation to paint onto a graphics object that is either the screen or an off-screen image that will subsequently painted onto the screen.

Invoked after renderUpdate().

Parameters:
g - a graphics context to paint/draw with.
width - the width of the drawing area.
height - the height of the drawing area.

renderShutdown

void renderShutdown()
Invoked when rendering is shutdown to allow the implementation to perform any necessary cleanup.
